amendatorysection.catchline: Judgment on appeal; certified copy sent to county judge.
amendatorysection.para: After entry of final judgment in the district court on the appeal, a certified copy thereof shall be prepared and transmitted by the clerk of the district court to the county judge.

annotation.para: Clerk of district court is required to certify and transmit to county judge a certified copy of final judgment rendered on appeal. Blecha v. School Dist. of Hebron, 173 Neb. 183, 112 N.W.2d 783 (1962).
